content.rendered:
[vc_row content_placement=”middle”][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_single_image image=”1481″ img_size=”full”][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_column_text]IIT (ISM) Dhanbad holds a prominent position as a cornerstone of India’s educational landscape, offering excellence in Science, Technology, and Management education, with a distinct focus on fields such as Mining, Petroleum, and Engineering.

Its illustrious legacy includes shaping industry leaders and visionaries. Today, IIT (ISM) Dhanbad is on a transformative journey, evolving into a leading hub for petroleum and earth sciences, harnessing the power of AI and big data to drive innovation and sustainable solutions for a rapidly changing world.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row el_class=”dft-spacer”][vc_column][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][vc_column_text]

Challenges faced by the Client

  • The client has been manually managing tender and project life cycles, facing challenges with fund allocation, time management, and approval processes.
  • They seek to streamline and automate these processes for improved efficiency and transparency, implementing a system involving multiple authorities with different roles and privileges to effectively inform, track, manage, and operate projects and tenders.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][vc_column_text]

Solutions provided by Dreams Technologies

  • Dreams Technologies deployed its comprehensive NewHRMS – Human Resource Management System, customized with a wide range of modules to meet client expectations.
  • The NewHRMS system was securely deployed in a private AWS cloud infrastructure, ensuring high performance, availability, and scalability.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” el_class=”dft-spacer greybg”][vc_column][vc_column_text]

Technologies Used

[/vc_column_text][vc_raw_html][/vc_raw_html][vc_empty_space height=”20px”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_empty_space height=”60px”][vc_raw_html]JTNDZGl2JTIwY2xhc3MlM0QlMjJzZWN0aW9uLWhlYWRlci1pbmZvJTIwdGV4dC1jZW50ZXIlMjIlM0UlMEElMjAlMjAlMjAlMjAlM0NoMiUyMGNsYXNzJTNEJTIybWItMCUyMiUzRUNhc2UlMjBTdHVkaWVzJTNDc3BhbiUzRUNhc2UlMjBTdHVkaWVzJTNDJTJGc3BhbiUzRSUzQyUyRmgyJTNFJTBBJTNDJTJGZGl2JTNF[/vc_raw_html][vc_basic_grid post_type=”casestudies” max_items=”3″ grid_id=”vc_gid:1744028562594-fee94ff3-eec0-0″ el_class=”rec-blg-posts all-case-studies”][vc_raw_html][/vc_raw_html][/vc_column][/vc_row]
